transcriptions.original: THE MORE SHE IS ENGAGED IN HER PROPER DUTIES THE LESS LEISURE WILL SHE HAVE FOR IT EVEN AS AN ACCOMPLISHMENT AND A RECREATION
transcriptions.target: OLD WILL IS A FINE FELLOW BUT POOR AND HELPLESS SINCE MISSUS ROGERS HAD HER ACCIDENT
transcriptions.prediction: The more she's engaged in her proper duties, the less leisure will she have for it, even as an accomplishment and a recreation.

transcriptions.prediction: The more it will be the earlier toughest of the 30-50-50, the more you'll be able to buy it. And the more you'll be able to make it last year, the easier it gets.
